description: Power electronic semiconductors, switch mode power converters, motor drives & their control. Digital signal interfacing, including optoelectronic & transceivers. Precision analog signal conditioning. High speed & low power techniques. Practical circuit construction & testing techniques.
prerequisites:
For ELEC4400: prereq ELEC3400
For ELEC7402: prereq ELEC7401
incompatible:
For ELEC4400: inc ELEC7402
For ELEC7402: inc ELEC4400
